WebGL2RenderingContext.summary: The WebGL2RenderingContext interface provides the OpenGL ES 3.0 rendering context for the drawing surface of an HTML canvas element.

remarks.para: To get an object of this interface, call on a <canvas> element, supplying "webgl2" as the argument:

blockquote.para: WebGL 2 is an extension to WebGL 1. The WebGL2RenderingContext interface implements all members of the interface. Some methods of the WebGL 1 context can accept additional values when used in a WebGL 2 context. You will find this info noted on the WebGL 1 reference pages.

remarks.para: The WebGL tutorial has more information, examples, and resources on how to get started with WebGL.
